languages.text: "Послушай, Абеляр. Есть вещи выше старых обязательств — например, жизнь тех, кто тебе дорог. Я дарую тебе право вернуться на Даргонус, когда все уляжется. Ты достаточно крови отдал фон Валанциус — прибереги немного для Версериан".

"Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."
languages.original_text: "Послушай, Абеляр. Есть вещи выше старых обязательств — например, жизнь тех, кто тебе дорог. Я дарую тебе право вернуться на Даргонус, когда все уляжется. Ты достаточно крови отдал фон Валанциус — прибереги немного для Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

"Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

"Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

"Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

languages.text: «Escúcheme, Abelard. Hay cosas más importantes que honrar un viejo compromiso: las vidas de sus seres queridos, por ejemplo. De modo que le concedo permiso para regresar a Dargonus cuando las cosas se hayan calmado. Ya ha vertido usted demasiada sangre por los von Valancius; guarde un poco para los Werserian».
languages.original_text: "Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: «Escúcheme, Abelard. Hay cosas más importantes que honrar un viejo compromiso: las vidas de sus seres queridos, por ejemplo. De modo que le concedo permiso para regresar a Dargonus cuando las cosas se hayan calmado. Ya ha vertido usted demasiada sangre por los von Valancius; guarde un poco para los Werserian».

languages.text: 「聞け、アベラルド。この世界には古い義務を守るより大事なことがある――愛する者たちの命もそのひとつだ。事態が落ち着いたらダルゴナスに戻る許可をここに与える。お前はフォン・ヴァランシウス家のために多くの血を捧げてきた。今度はウェルザリアン家のために捧げろ」
languages.original_text: "Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: 「聞け、アベラルド。この世界には古い義務を守るより大事なことがある――愛する者たちの命もそのひとつだ。事態が落ち着いたらダルゴナスに戻る許可をここに与える。お前はフォン・ヴァランシウス家のために多くの血を捧げてきた。今度はウェルザリアン家のために捧げろ」

languages.text: “阿贝拉德，听我说，有些事情比履行那些古老的义务更加重要。比如说，保护你所爱之人的生命。我在此准许你，当这一切结束之后，你就可以返回达戈努斯了。你为冯·瓦兰修斯家族流的血已经够多了……留一些给韦尔森家族吧。”
languages.original_text: "Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德，听我说，有些事情比履行那些古老的义务更加重要。比如说，保护你所爱之人的生命。我在此准许你，当这一切结束之后，你就可以返回达戈努斯了。你为冯·瓦兰修斯家族流的血已经够多了……留一些给韦尔森家族吧。”

languages.text: « Écoutez-moi, Abélard. Il y a des choses plus importantes qu'honorer d'antiques obligations... la vie de ceux qui vous sont chers, par exemple. Je vous autorise donc à retourner sur Dargonus lorsque les choses se seront calmées. Vous avez versé assez de sang pour les von Valancius, gardez-en pour les Werserian. »
languages.original_text: "Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez-moi, Abélard. Il y a des choses plus importantes qu'honorer d'antiques obligations... la vie de ceux qui vous sont chers, par exemple. Je vous autorise donc à retourner sur Dargonus lorsque les choses se seront calmées. Vous avez versé assez de sang pour les von Valancius, gardez-en pour les Werserian. »

languages.text: "Hört mich an, Abelard. Manche Dinge sind wichtiger, als alte Verpflichtungen zu ehren. Zum Beispiel das Leben Eurer Lieben. Ich gewähre Euch hiermit die Erlaubnis, nach Dargonus zurückzukehren, wenn sich alles beruhigt hat. Ihr habt der Familie von Valancius genug Blut gegeben — hebt Euch noch etwas für die Werserians auf."
languages.original_text: "Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: "Hört mich an, Abelard. Manche Dinge sind wichtiger, als alte Verpflichtungen zu ehren. Zum Beispiel das Leben Eurer Lieben. Ich gewähre Euch hiermit die Erlaubnis, nach Dargonus zurückzukehren, wenn sich alles beruhigt hat. Ihr habt der Familie von Valancius genug Blut gegeben — hebt Euch noch etwas für die Werserians auf."

languages.text: "Dinle beni Abelard. Bazı şeyler, eski sözleri tutmaktan daha önemlidir. Sevdiklerinin canı mesela. Bu vesileyle mevcut vaziyet durulduğunda Dargonus'a dönmene izin veriyorum. Von Valanciuslar için yeterince ter döktün, birazını da Werserianlara sakla."
languages.original_text: "Listen to me, Abelard. Some things are more important than honouring old obligations — the lives of your loved ones, for instance. I hereby grant you leave to return to Dargonus when things have settled down. You have given enough blood to the von Valancius — save some for the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: "Dinle beni Abelard. Bazı şeyler, eski sözleri tutmaktan daha önemlidir. Sevdiklerinin canı mesela. Bu vesileyle mevcut vaziyet durulduğunda Dargonus'a dönmene izin veriyorum. Von Valanciuslar için yeterince ter döktün, birazını da Werserian hanesine sakla."
